article.headline: Sam Houston St. 107, Lamar 85
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas (AP) -- Jason Stephenson scored 26 points and Wilder Auguste added 23 points and 13 rebounds to lead Sam Houston State to a 107-85 win over Lamar Friday. Other players in double digits for Sam Houston State ( 13-14, 8-8 Southland Conference), were Joe Thompson with 15 points and 10 assists, Chris Jordan with 12 points and Ryan Griffin with 10. Terrell Petteway led Lamar ( 11-18, 5-11) with 26 points and 10 rebounds. Raymond Anthony had 21 points and seven assists, and Blake Whittle added 20. Sam Houston outscored Lamar 52-41 in the first half. Sam Houston shot 65 percent from the field to Lamar's 43 percent. Sam Houston also dominated on the boards, grabbing 42 rebounds to Lamar's 28.
